routes.description: Responds with JSON of all USER documents.
Receives JSON of USER data and adds it to the USER Collection.
Responds with JSON of a specific USER document based on the ID given.
Receives JSON of updated USER data and modifies the specific USER document.
Removes a specific USER document based on the ID given from the Collection.
Responds with JSON of all CONCERT documents.
Receives JSON of CONCERT data and adds it to the CONCERT Collection.
Responds with JSON of a specific CONCERT document based on the ID given.
Receives JSON of updated CONCERT data and modifies the specific CONCERT Document.
Receives JSON of VENUE data and modifies the specific CONCERT Document to add an embedded VENUE Document.
